name: Blocks Maze
description:
Find a way to exit the board with the small and large red blocks..
Some people said that there is no tutorials in the game o__o .. but If i told you every thing about how to complete the game.. then you will miss a lot of fun of discovering ^__^ .
have a lot of fun and thinking..
[Features]
- Use your brain to find away to get out from the board with the two red boxes.
- Simple to play.
- Up to 24 levels.
